Always Appreciate your Feedback! Welcome to Geeks Empire! Thanks for Joining to Our #FloatIt üéà Community. ‚ö° Become Master Of Multitasking ‚ö° Thanks in Advance üôè Permissions Info, Be Patient! Hi… ☺
I need your Permission to create Shortcuts in Floating View. Please Grant permission by Enabling the Switch.
Also to make me Smarter Please go to Preferences, Details & Practical Info to Enable Smart Features.
Press Grant to Proceed to Settings.
Thanks! Split Floating Shortcuts ·¥æ·¥ø·¥º | This permission gives me the ability to create Multi-Window & Open Apps in Split Screen Simultaneously (Android 7 & Higher)\n\n‚ôø How it Helps People with Disability?\nIt is difficult for people with disability to open an app Or switch between apps. I am using Accessibility Service to enter Multi-Window Mode to open two apps together. Split Floating Shortcuts ·¥æ·¥ø·¥º | This Permission Gives me the Ability to Create Multi-Window & Open Apps in Split Screen Simultaneously (Android 7 & Higher)
This Permission Allows Me to Create Multi-Window Mode üóî & Open Pair of Apps in Split Screen Simultaneously.
(Android 7 & Higher)

‚ôø How it Helps People with Disability?
It is Difficult for People with Disability to Open an App Or Switch Between Apps.
So, I am Using Accessibility Service to Create Multi-Window Mode to Open Two Apps Together.
